resources.string: We\'re having trouble processing your request. This could be due to a server error, an invalid API key, or a problem with your network connection. Please verify your API key and ensure your device has a stable internet connection. If the issue persists, try again later.
Please check your API Token and try again. If you don\'t have one, you can get one from your Lunch Money account settings.
We could\'t load your transactions. Please try again later.
We could\'t load your account overview. Please try again later.

Welcome to Lunch Money Companion, developed independently by Rodrigo Lopes Martins. This application is designed to help you manage your finances more effectively. Please read these terms carefully before using the app.

API Usage: Our app utilizes the Lunch Money API to access and display your financial data. We do not have any affiliation or partnership with Lunch Money. The use of their API is solely for the purpose of data retrieval and display within our app.

Data Privacy: Your privacy is paramount to us. We assure you that our app does not store, collect, or share any of your personal information. All data displayed in the app is fetched in real-time from the Lunch Money API and is not recorded or stored by our application.

User Responsibility: As a user, you are responsible for the security of your Lunch Money account credentials. Our app only uses these credentials to access the API and does not store them.

Liability: Rodrigo Lopes Martins is not liable for any data inaccuracies, loss of data, or any other issues arising from the use of the Lunch Money API. The app acts as a conduit for displaying your financial data and does not modify or interact with your data beyond this.

Changes to Terms: These terms are subject to change at any time. Users will be notified of any changes to the terms of use, and continued use of the app will constitute acceptance of the new terms.

By using this application, you acknowledge and agree to these terms of use.
